thread.title_full: Intelemage Announces Establishment of New Hospital Solutions Division

author: Dan Braga
title: Intelemage Announces Establishment of New Hospital Solutions Division
text:
Intelemage is excited to announce today the establishment of a new Hospital Solutions Division to meet the growing demand for tele-health solutions from their industry-leading footprint of hospital locations. Hospitals that currently utilize Intelemage technology to power life sciences initiatives have continued to show a strong interest in expanding their use of Intelemage solutions into other areas such as tumor board management, video consults, and more. To lead this newly formed division, Intelemage has named Jason Wickes as Vice President, Hospital Solutions. Jason has over ten (10) years experience in the radiology services industry, the past three (3) years with Intelemage.
Additionally, Dan Braga, Intelemage Co-Founder, will assume the new role of Vice President, Life Sciences Solutions. The Life Science Solutions division is Intelemage's largest and fastest growing business segment as Intelemage is increasingly becoming the preferred choice for clinical trials, post approval physician training, and pre-surgical planning projects within the medical device, pharmaceutical, and core lab markets.
"The medical institutions that regularly use our software platform to support their research and pre-surgical planning activities sponsored by medical device and pharmaceutical companies are increasing their focus on tele-health services", said Dan Braga. "We are honored to see that so many of those institutions recognize that the same data collection and transfer platform that they use for life science projects, along with our advanced workflow management, video collaboration, and viewing tools, can also be utilized to power the exciting tele-heath initiatives that they are planning to launch.”
About Intelemage:
Intelemage® was founded in early 2007 and is currently powering the medical imaging and clinical data collaboration activities for global hospitals, physicians, medical device and pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, and core labs.
Intelemage is entrusted to deliver secure, reliable and compliant transfers of medical image files and related patient data, along with efficient, web-based, workflow-driven project specific portals by:
 Fortune 500 Pharmaceutical and Medical Device Companies Leading Academic Hospitals and Healthcare Facilities Top Surgeons and Radiologists Professional Sports Leagues and Teams
